name: Enclave Plasma Gun Aligned Automatic Barrel
desc: Improved recoil and hip-fire accuracy. Reduces Action Point (AP) cost by 5%.

name: Enclave Plasma Gun Aligned Sniper Barrel
desc: Improved recoil and hip-fire accuracy. Increases range and damage. Reduces AP cost by 5%.

name: Enclave Plasma Gun Aligned Splitter
desc: Splits beam into 4 projectiles. Improved recoil and hip-fire accuracy. Reduces AP cost by 5%.

name: Enclave Plasma Gun Automatic Barrel
desc: Enables full-automatic fire for high-rate of fire builds. Improved hip-fire accuracy.

name: Enclave Plasma Gun Gamma Wave Emitter
desc: Adds Burning damage to attacks and increases Critical Hit damage by 15%.

name: Enclave Plasma Gun Long Recon Scope
desc: Superior magnification. Automatically marks/tracks enemies while aiming down sights.

name: Enclave Plasma Gun Long Scope
desc: Superior magnification for long-range engagements. Increases weapon weight.

name: Enclave Plasma Gun Medium Night Vision Scope
desc: Better magnification and provides high-clarity green-tinted night vision capabilities.

name: Enclave Plasma Gun Medium Scope
desc: Better magnification for medium-to-long range combat.

name: Enclave Plasma Gun Precise Stock
desc: Greatly improves weapon durability and improves Bash damage and hip-fire accuracy.

name: Enclave Plasma Gun Reflex Sight
desc: Optimized for VATS builds. Best-in-slot sight that reduces Action Point (AP) cost by 15%.

name: Enclave Plasma Gun Short Night Vision Scope
desc: Improved magnification with night vision. Known for providing the highest AP cost increase.

name: Enclave Plasma Gun Splitter
desc: Standard beam splitter that turns the plasma gun into a shotgun-like weapon.

name: Enclave Plasma Gun Stabilized Automatic Barrel
desc: Enables full-automatic fire with superior recoil control.

name: Enclave Plasma Gun True Flamer Barrel
desc: Fires a continuous stream of plasma. Provides superior hip-fire accuracy.

name: Enclave Plasma Gun True Short Barrel
desc: Standard-range semi-auto barrel with superior hip-fire accuracy.

name: Enclave Plasma Gun True Sniper Barrel
desc: Long-range semi-auto barrel with superior hip-fire accuracy.

name: Enclave Plasma Gun True Splitter
desc: Beam splitter with superior hip-fire accuracy. Ideal for manual aiming builds.
